location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 11; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Ministry of War Transport, the India Office and the Government of India, External Affairs Department regarding the request and appointment of an expert for Muscat in order to assist in making the territory self-supporting in the production of cereal.
